Sergei Prokofiev

Sonata no. 5 in C major, op. 135 (second version)

1952–1953

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 15'

  • 1. Allegro tranquillo
  • 2. Andantino
  • 3. Un poco allegretto

This sonata exists in an earlier version (op. 38) from 1923.

1. Allegro tranquillo

Duration: 6'

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Andantino

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3

3. Un poco allegretto

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 4
